home.title-1: WHY ARE OUR FERTILIZERS BETTER THAN CONVENTIONAL FERTILIZERS?
home.paragraph-icon: Plan to use the entire surface of your garden. Through techniques such as vertical cultivation, cultivation in succession and intercropping you can make the most of the space available.
home.tip-text-1: To save space in your garden, grow climbing beans, peas, cucumbers and pumpkins on trellises. Existing gates, posts, wire cages and trellises serve as support.
home.tip-text-2: This technique consists of growing a plant like lettuce in the spring and replacing it when the heat begins with another plant like beans. In late summer the process can be reversed and the beans can be replaced by a cool-season crop such as lettuce or radishes.
home.tip-text-3: Intercropping consists of planting fast growing vegetables along with slow growing vegetables. An example of this technique may be planting radishes, lettuce or green onions along with tomato plants in wire cages.

about-us.title: WHO ARE WE?
about-us.text-1: is your best option when it comes to sowing and obtaining an abundant crop. It is thanks to the quality of production that your products have. We are a company committed to offering a fast and personalized service with a staff with years of experience in the field.
about-us.text-2: We have a wide variety of solutions for each type of soil according to your needs. Come and see for yourself the quality of our products.
about-us.vision-text: To lead the marketing of fertilizers in the Caribbean, innovating solutions for sustainable agriculture, profitable for customers, employees and shareholders.
about-us.mission-text: We produce and commercialize fertilizers, with high quality standards, developing solutions for the agricultural sector through a personalized technical service, to guarantee the success of the crops.
about-us.value-text-1: We encourage collaboration in order to achieve our goals.
about-us.value-text-2: We make the needs of external and internal customers our own, and give our all to achieve a memorable experience.
about-us.value-text-3: We are passionate about doing things right.
about-us.value-text-4: We treat people with dignity, valuing their ideas and opinions. We respect the environment in which we operate.
about-us.value-text-5: We work hard enough to create or reinvent products, services and processes, taking best practices as a reference, always seeking continuous improvement.
about-us.value-text-6: We provide products and services with the highest quality standards.
about-us.value-text-7: We align our work to the achievement of the company's strategic objectives. We focus our efforts on concrete results.
